tiktok.hook: POV: Your eye doctor sees something you can't
tiktok.body: Show actual retinal image on screen. 'See these tiny yellow spots? Early diabetes signs - 6 months before your regular doctor would catch it.' Cut to different image. 'These white patches? High blood pressure damaging blood vessels.' Show normal healthy retina. 'This is what we want to see.' End with doctor direct to camera: 'Your eyes are the only place we can see blood vessels without surgery. Comprehensive eye exams save lives, not just vision.' Text overlay of health conditions caught through eye exams scrolls.
tiktok.cta: Book your comprehensive exam - link in bio

Cut to child trying on glasses, face lights up. 'Mom, the leaves have edges!' Fast forward to report card improvement. End with child confidently reading. Text: '1 in 4 kids has undetected vision problems.'

Show your glasses before/after glow-up. Old frames vs new frames side-by-side selfie. Tell us how your confidence changed.

viral_triggers.angle: What Your Eye Doctor Sees vs What You See - split screen showing normal vision vs retinal image revealing hidden health conditions (diabetes, tumors, aneurysms)
viral_triggers.why: Fear appeal + educational value + visual fascination. People tag friends saying 'did you know this?' Drives appointment bookings through health anxiety.

viral_triggers.angle: Use It or Lose It Calculator - interactive tool showing exactly how much insurance money expires Dec 31st, with dramatic countdown timer and specific dollar amount wasted
viral_triggers.why: Loss aversion trigger + personalized stakes + urgency. People share when they discover they're losing $300+. Peaks in Q4.
